Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.name: ElementGenerator
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.abstract: Typealias that serves as a placeholder for a closure that returns a new SVGElement instance

Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.name: tags
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.abstract: A dictionary of all the supported elements and attributes for a given parser.

Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.name: init(tags:)
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.abstract: Initializer to create your own set of supported tags

Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.name: barebones
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.abstract: A configuration that will only parse <path> elements and the d and fill attributes. Use this configuration if you know you will only be parsing <path> elements with fill colors

Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.name: allSupportedElements
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html#.abstract: A configuration that is the full set of elements and attributes that SwiftSVG supports. This is the default configuration for the NSXMLSVGParser.

Structs/PathDLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10Pa.name: init(pathString:)
Structs/PathDLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10Pa.abstract: Initializer for creating a new PathDLexer from a path d string

Structs/PathDLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10Pa.name: makeIterator()
Structs/PathDLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10Pa.abstract: Required by Swift’s IteratorProtocol that returns a new PathDLexer

Structs/PathDLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10Pa.name: next()
Structs/PathDLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10Pa.abstract: Required by Swift’s IteratorProtocol that returns the next PathCommand or nil if it’s at the end of the sequence

Structs/PathDConstants.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: DCharacter
Structs/PathDConstants.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: Valid path letters that can be used in the path d string

Structs/PathDConstants.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: characterDictionary
Structs/PathDConstants.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: A dictionary that generates a new PathCommand based on the CChar value of the SVG path letter

Structs/SmoothCurveTo.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.name: execute(on:previousCommand:)
Structs/SmoothCurveTo.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.abstract: Shortcut cubic Bezier curve to that add a new path ending up at CGPoint(self.coordinateBuffer[0], self.coordinateBuffer[1]) with a single control point in the middle.

Structs/CurveTo.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7CurveT.name: execute(on:previousCommand:)
Structs/CurveTo.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7CurveT.abstract: Adds a cubic Bezier curve to path. The path will end up at CGPoint(self.coordinateBuffer[4], self.coordinateBuffer[5]). The control point for path.currentPoint will be CGPoint(self.coordinateBuffer[0], self.coordinateBuffer[1]). Then controle point for the end point will be CGPoint(self.coordinateBuffer[2], self.coordinateBuffer[3])

Structs/VerticalLineTo.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: execute(on:previousCommand:)
Structs/VerticalLineTo.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: Adds a vertical line from the currentPoint to CGPoint(path.currentPoint.y, self.coordinateBuffer[0])

Structs/HorizontalLineTo.html#/s:8SwiftS.name: execute(on:previousCommand:)
Structs/HorizontalLineTo.html#/s:8SwiftS.abstract: Adds a horizontal line from the currentPoint to CGPoint(self.coordinateBuffer[0], path.currentPoint.y)

Structs/LineTo.html#/s:8SwiftSVG6LineToV.name: execute(on:previousCommand:)
Structs/LineTo.html#/s:8SwiftSVG6LineToV.abstract: Creates a line from the path.currentPoint to point CGPoint(self.coordinateBuffer[0], coordinateBuffer[1])

Structs/MoveTo.html#/s:8SwiftSVG6MoveToV.name: execute(on:previousCommand:)
Structs/MoveTo.html#/s:8SwiftSVG6MoveToV.abstract: This will move the current point to CGPoint(self.coordinateBuffer[0], self.coordinateBuffer[1]).

Structs/CoordinateLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSV.name: init(coordinateString:)
Structs/CoordinateLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSV.abstract: Creates a new CoordinateLexer from a comma or space separated number string

Structs/CoordinateLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSV.name: makeIterator()
Structs/CoordinateLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSV.abstract: Required by Swift’s IteratorProtocol that returns a new CoordinateLexer

Structs/CoordinateLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSV.name: next()
Structs/CoordinateLexer.html#/s:8SwiftSV.abstract: Required by Swift’s IteratorProtocol that returns the next CGPoint or nil if it’s at the end of the sequence

Structs/NamedColors.html#/s:8SwiftSVG11N.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/NamedColors.html#/s:8SwiftSVG11N.abstract: Subscript to access the named color. Must be one of the officially supported values listed here

Structs/SVGRootElement.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: parseWidth(lengthString:)
Structs/SVGRootElement.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: Function that parses a number string and sets the containerLayer‘s width

Structs/SVGRootElement.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: parseHeight(lengthString:)
Structs/SVGRootElement.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: Function that parses a number string and sets the containerLayer‘s height

Structs/SVGPolyline.html#/s:8SwiftSVG11S.name: points(points:)
Structs/SVGPolyline.html#/s:8SwiftSVG11S.abstract: Parses a coordinate string and creates a new polyline based on them

Structs/SVGPolygon.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.name: points(points:)
Structs/SVGPolygon.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.abstract: Function that parses a coordinate string and creates a polygon path

Structs.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9TransformV.name: Transform
Structs.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9TransformV.abstract: A struct that represents a single transformation that can then be combined with other Transforms

Structs/SVGPolygon.html.name: SVGPolygon
Structs/SVGPolygon.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <polygon> element and its attributes

Structs/SVGPolyline.html.name: SVGPolyline
Structs/SVGPolyline.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <polyline> element and its attributes

Structs/SVGRootElement.html.name: SVGRootElement
Structs/SVGRootElement.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a container from a <svg> element and its attributes. This will almost always be the root container element that will container all other SVGElement layers

Structs/NamedColors.html.name: NamedColors
Structs/NamedColors.html.abstract: A struct that represents named colors as listed here

Structs/CoordinateLexer.html.name: CoordinateLexer
Structs/CoordinateLexer.html.abstract: A struct that conforms to the Sequence protocol that takes a coordinate string and continuously returnsCGPoints

Structs/MoveTo.html.name: MoveTo
Structs/MoveTo.html.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG M or m command

Structs/ClosePath.html.name: ClosePath
Structs/ClosePath.html.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG Z or z command

Structs/LineTo.html.name: LineTo
Structs/LineTo.html.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG L or l command

Structs/HorizontalLineTo.html.name: HorizontalLineTo
Structs/HorizontalLineTo.html.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG H or h command

Structs/VerticalLineTo.html.name: VerticalLineTo
Structs/VerticalLineTo.html.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG V or v command

Structs/CurveTo.html.name: CurveTo
Structs/CurveTo.html.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG C or c command

Structs/SmoothCurveTo.html.name: SmoothCurveTo
Structs/SmoothCurveTo.html.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG S or s command

Structs/QuadraticCurveTo.html.name: QuadraticCurveTo
Structs/QuadraticCurveTo.html.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG Q or q command

Structs/SmoothQuadraticCurveTo.html.name: SmoothQuadraticCurveTo
Structs/SmoothQuadraticCurveTo.html.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG T or t command

Structs.html#/s:8SwiftSVG13EllipticalArc.name: EllipticalArc
Structs.html#/s:8SwiftSVG13EllipticalArc.abstract: The PathCommand that corresponds to the SVG A or a command

Structs/PathDConstants.html.name: PathDConstants
Structs/PathDConstants.html.abstract: A struct that maps <path> d commands to SVGElements

Structs/PathDLexer.html.name: PathDLexer
Structs/PathDLexer.html.abstract: A struct that conforms to the Sequence protocol that takes a <path> d string and returns SVGElement instances

Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html.name: SVGParserSupportedElements
Structs/SVGParserSupportedElements.html.abstract: A struct that lists all the supported elements and attributes for a parser

Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SV.name: completionBlock
Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SV.abstract: A closure that is executed after all elements have been processed. Should be guaranteed to be executed after all elements have been processed, even if parsing asynchronously.

Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SV.name: supportedElements
Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SV.abstract: A struct listing all the elements and its attributes that should be parsed

Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SV.name: containerLayer
Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SV.abstract: A CALayer that will house the finished sublayers of the SVG doc.

Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SV.name: startParsing()
Protocols/SVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SV.abstract: Starts parsing the SVG. Allows you to separate initialization from parse start in case you want to set some things up first.

Protocols/PreviousCommand.html#/s:8Swift.name: coordinateBuffer
Protocols/PreviousCommand.html#/s:8Swift.abstract: An array that stores processed coordinates values

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.name: coordinateBuffer
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.abstract: An array that stores processed coordinates values

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.name: numberOfRequiredParameters
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.abstract: The minimum number of coordinates needed to process the path command

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.name: init(pathType:)
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.abstract: Designated initializer that creates a relative or absolute PathCommand

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.name: execute(on:previousCommand:)
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.abstract: Once the numberOfRequiredParameters has been met, this method will append new path to the passed path

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.name: canPushCommand
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.abstract: Default implementation for any PathCommand indicating where there are enough coordinates stored to be able to process the SVGElement

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.name: clearBuffer()
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.abstract: Function that clears the current number buffer

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.name: pushCoordinate(_:)
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.abstract: Adds a new coordinate to the buffer

Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.name: pointForPathType(_:relativeTo:)
Protocols/PathCommand.html#/s:8SwiftSVG1.abstract: Based on the PathType of this PathCommand, this function returns the relative or absolute point

Protocols/StackType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: pop()
Protocols/StackType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Default implementation of popping the last element off the stack

Protocols/StackType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: push(_:)
Protocols/StackType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Push a new element on to the stack

Protocols/StackType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: count
Protocols/StackType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Returns the number of elements on the stack

Protocols/StackType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: isEmpty
Protocols/StackType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Check whether the stack is empty or not

Protocols/StackType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: last
Protocols/StackType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Return the last element on the stack without popping it off the stack. Equivalent to peek in other stack implementations

Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html#/s:8Swift.name: svgLayer
Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html#/s:8Swift.abstract: The CAShapeLayer that can draw the path data.

Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html#/s:8Swift.name: boundingBox
Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html#/s:8Swift.abstract: The minimum rect that encompasses all of the subpaths

Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10.name: elementName
Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10.abstract: The element name as defined in the SVG specification

Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10.name: supportedAttributes
Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10.abstract: Dictionary of attributes of a given element that are supported by the SVGParser. Keys are the name of an element’s attribute such as d, fill, and rx. Values are a closure that is used to process the given attribute.

Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10.name: didProcessElement(in:)
Protocols/SVGElement.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10.abstract: An action to perform once the parser has dispatched all attributes to a given SVGElement instance

Protocols/SVGContainerElement.html#/s:8S.name: containerLayer
Protocols/SVGContainerElement.html#/s:8S.abstract: The layer that stores all the SVG sublayers

Protocols/ParsesAsynchronously.html#/s:8.name: asyncParseManager
Protocols/ParsesAsynchronously.html#/s:8.abstract: The delegate instance that can manage asynchronous parsing

Protocols/CanManageAsychronousParsing.ht.name: finishedProcessing(_:)
Protocols/CanManageAsychronousParsing.ht.abstract: The callback called when an ParsesAsynchronously element has finished parsing

Protocols/Transformable.html#/s:8SwiftSV.name: layerToTransform
Protocols/Transformable.html#/s:8SwiftSV.abstract: Default implementation for a SVGContainerElement that transforms the containerLayer

Protocols/Transformable.html#/s:8SwiftSV.name: layerToTransform
Protocols/Transformable.html#/s:8SwiftSV.abstract: Default implementation for a SVGShapeElement that transforms the svgLayer

Protocols/Transformable.html#/s:8SwiftSV.name: transformAttributes
Protocols/Transformable.html#/s:8SwiftSV.abstract: The curried function to be used for the SVGElement‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Transformable.html#/s:8SwiftSV.name: transformAttributes
Protocols/Transformable.html#/s:8SwiftSV.abstract: The curried function to be used for the SVGElement‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Transformable.html#/s:8SwiftSV.name: transform(_:)
Protocols/Transformable.html#/s:8SwiftSV.abstract: Parses and applies the SVG transform string to this SVGElement‘s SVGLayer. Can parse multiple transforms separated by spaces

Protocols/Stylable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Sty.name: styleAttributes
Protocols/Stylable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Sty.abstract: The curried function to be used for the SVGElement‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Stylable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Sty.name: styleAttributes
Protocols/Stylable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Sty.abstract: The curried function to be used for the SVGElement‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Stylable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Sty.name: style(_:)
Protocols/Stylable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Sty.abstract: Parses and applies the css-style style string to this SVGElement‘s SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeAttributes
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: The curried functions to be used for the SVGShapeElement‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeLineCap(lineCap:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Sets the stroke line cap of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeColor(strokeColor:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Sets the stroke color of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeLineJoin(lineJoin:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Sets the stroke line join of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeMiterLimit(miterLimit:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Sets the stroke miter limit of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeWidth(strokeWidth:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Sets the stroke width of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeAttributes
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: The curried functions to be used for the SVGGroup‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeLineCap(lineCap:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Sets the stroke line cap of all subelements

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeColor(strokeColor:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Sets the stroke color of all subelements

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeLineJoin(lineJoin:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Sets the stroke line join of all subelements

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeMiterLimit(miterLimit:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Sets the stroke miter limit of all subelements

Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.name: strokeWidth(strokeWidth:)
Protocols/Strokable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9St.abstract: Sets the stroke width of all subelements

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.name: fillAttributes
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.abstract: The curried functions to be used for the SVGShapeElement‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.name: fill(fillColor:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.abstract: Sets the fill color of the underlying SVGLayer

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.name: fillRule(fillRule:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.abstract: Sets the fill rule of the underlying SVGLayer. CAShapeLayers have 2 possible values: non-zero (default), and evenodd

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.name: fillOpacity(opacity:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.abstract: Sets the fill opacity of the underlying SVGLayer through its CGColor, not the CALayer’s opacity property. This value will override any opacity value passed in with the fill-color attribute.

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.name: fillAttributes
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.abstract: The curried functions to be used for the SVGGroup‘s default implementation. This dictionary is meant to be used in the SVGParserSupportedElements instance

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.name: fill(_:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.abstract: Sets the fill color for all subelements of the SVGGroup

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.name: fillRule(_:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.abstract: Sets the fill rule for all subelements of the SVGGroup. CAShapeLayers have 2 possible values: non-zero (default), and evenodd

Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.name: fillOpacity(_:)
Protocols/Fillable.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8Fil.abstract: Sets the fill opacity for all subelements of the SVGGroup through its CGColor, not the CALayer’s opacity property.

Protocols/DelaysApplyingAttributes.html#.name: delayedAttributes
Protocols/DelaysApplyingAttributes.html#.abstract: The attributes to apply to all sublayers after all subelements have been processed.

Protocols/SVGLayerType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: resizeToFit(_:)
Protocols/SVGLayerType.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: Scales a layer to aspect fit the given size.

Protocols/SVGLayerType.html.name: SVGLayerType
Protocols/SVGLayerType.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that can store bounding box information

Protocols/DelaysApplyingAttributes.html.name: DelaysApplyingAttributes
Protocols/DelaysApplyingAttributes.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that will delay processing attributes, usually until in didProcessElement(in container: SVGContainerElement?) because either all path information isn’t available or when the element needs to apply an attribute to all subelements.

Protocols/Fillable.html.name: Fillable
Protocols/Fillable.html.abstract: A protocol that described an instance that can be filled. Two default implementations are provided for this protocol:

Protocols/Strokable.html.name: Strokable
Protocols/Strokable.html.abstract: A protocol that described an instance that can be stroked. Two default implementations are provided for this protocol:

Protocols/Stylable.html.name: Stylable
Protocols/Stylable.html.abstract: A protocol that describes instances whose attributes that can be set vis a css style string. A default implementation is supplied that parses the style string and applies the attributes using the SVGelement‘s supportedAttributes.

Protocols/Transformable.html.name: Transformable
Protocols/Transformable.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that can be transformed via an SVG element’s transform attribute. Currently, matrix, rotate, scale, skewX, and skewY are supported. A default implementation is supplied for SVGContainerElements that sets the affineTransform of the container layer itself, not on all of its subelements.

Protocols/CanManageAsychronousParsing.ht.name: CanManageAsychronousParsing
Protocols/CanManageAsychronousParsing.ht.abstract: A protocol describing an instance that can manage elements that can parse asynchronously. In the NSXMLSVGParser implementation, the parser maintains a simple count of pending asynchronous tasks and decrements the count when an element has finished parsing. When the count has reached zero, a completion block is called

Protocols/ParsesAsynchronously.html.name: ParsesAsynchronously
Protocols/ParsesAsynchronously.html.abstract: A protocol describing an instance that parses asynchronously

Protocols/SVGContainerElement.html.name: SVGContainerElement
Protocols/SVGContainerElement.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that can store SVG sublayers and can apply a single attributes to all sublayers.

Protocols/SVGElement.html.name: SVGElement
Protocols/SVGElement.html.abstract: A protocol describing an instance that can parse a single SVG element such as

Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html.name: SVGShapeElement
Protocols/SVGShapeElement.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that stores the path as a CAShapeLayer

Protocols/StackType.html.name: StackType
Protocols/StackType.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that can act as a stack data structure

Protocols/PathCommand.html.name: PathCommand
Protocols/PathCommand.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that can process an individual SVG Element

Protocols/PreviousCommand.html.name: PreviousCommand
Protocols/PreviousCommand.html.abstract: A protocol that describes an instance that represents an SVGElement right before the current one

Protocols/SVGParser.html.name: SVGParser
Protocols/SVGParser.html.abstract: A protocol describing an XML parser capable of parsing SVG data

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS8SwiftSVGEyS.name: subscript(_:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS8SwiftSVGEyS.abstract: Helper function that creates a new String from a given integer range

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS8SwiftSVGE14.name: trimWhitespace()
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS8SwiftSVGE14.abstract: Function that trims the whitespace from the beginning and end of a string.

Extensions/Double.html#/s:Sd8SwiftSVGE9b.name: init(byteArray:)
Extensions/Double.html#/s:Sd8SwiftSVGE9b.abstract: Initializer that creates a new Double from a Character byte array

Extensions/Float.html#/s:Sf8SwiftSVGE9by.name: init(byteArray:)
Extensions/Float.html#/s:Sf8SwiftSVGE9by.abstract: Initializer that creates a new Float from a Character byte array

Extensions/CGFloat.html#/s:12CoreGraphic.name: init(_:)
Extensions/CGFloat.html#/s:12CoreGraphic.abstract: Initializer that creates a new CGFloat from a String

Extensions/CGFloat.html#/s:12CoreGraphic.name: init(byteArray:base:)
Extensions/CGFloat.html#/s:12CoreGraphic.abstract: Initializer that creates a new CGFloat from a Character byte array with the option to set the base.

Extensions/DispatchQueue.html#/s:So17OS_.name: safeAsync(_:)
Extensions/DispatchQueue.html#/s:So17OS_.abstract: An extension that will immediately execute the given block if already on the main thread

Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:SD8SwiftSV.name: add(_:)
Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:SD8SwiftSV.abstract: An extension that add the elements of one dictionary to another

Extensions/BinaryFloatingPoint.html#/s:S.name: init(lengthString:)
Extensions/BinaryFloatingPoint.html#/s:S.abstract: Parses a number string with optional suffix, such as px, mm

Extensions/CAShapeLayer.html#/s:So12CASh.name: init(pathString:)
Extensions/CAShapeLayer.html#/s:So12CASh.abstract: Convenience initalizer that synchronously parses a single path string and returns a CAShapeLayer

Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC8S.name: init(SVGURL:parser:completion:)
Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC8S.abstract: Convenience initializer that creates a new CALayer from a local or remote URL. You must provide a completion block and add the passed SVGLayer to a sublayer.

Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC8S.name: init(SVGData:parser:completion:)
Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC8S.abstract: Convenience initializer that creates a new CALayer from SVG data. You must provide a completion block and add the passed SVGLayer to a sublayer.

Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC8S.name: applyOnSublayers(ofType:closure:)
Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC8S.abstract: Helper function that applies the given closure on all sublayers of a given type

Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC8S.name: sublayers(in:)
Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC8S.abstract: Helper function that returns an array of all sublayers of a given type

Extensions/CALayer.html.name: CALayer
Extensions/CALayer.html.abstract: A set of convenience initializers that create new CALayer instances from SVG data.

Extensions/BinaryFloatingPoint.html.name: BinaryFloatingPoint
Extensions/BinaryFloatingPoint.html.abstract: Extension that takes a length string, e.g. 100px, 20mm and parses it into a BinaryFloatingPoint (e.g. Float, Double, CGFloat)

Extensions/Dictionary.html.name: Dictionary
Extensions/Dictionary.html.abstract: An extension that add the elements of one dictionary to another

Extensions/FloatingPoint.html.name: FloatingPoint
Extensions/FloatingPoint.html.abstract: Extension that converts a FloatingPoint to and from radians and degrees

Enums.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8LineJoinO.name: LineJoin
Enums.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8LineJoinO.abstract: Line join type that corresponds to the SVG line join string

Enums.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7LineCapO.name: LineCap
Enums.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7LineCapO.abstract: Line cap type that corresponds to the SVG line cap string

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: SVGParserError
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: Error type used when a fatal error has occured

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: containerLayer
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: The SVGLayer that will contain all of the SVG’s sublayers

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: init(SVGURL:supportedElements:completion:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: Convenience initializer that can initalize an NSXMLSVGParser using a local or remote URL

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: init(SVGData:supportedElements:completion:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: Initializer that can initalize an NSXMLSVGParser using SVG Data

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/c:@M@SwiftS.name: parser(_:didStartElement:namespaceURI:qualifiedName:attributes:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/c:@M@SwiftS.abstract: The XMLParserDelegate method called when the parser has started parsing an SVG element. This implementation will loop through all supported attributes and dispatch the attribiute value to the given curried function.

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/c:@M@SwiftS.name: parser(_:didEndElement:namespaceURI:qualifiedName:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/c:@M@SwiftS.abstract: The XMLParserDelegate method called when the parser has ended parsing an SVG element. This methods pops the last element parsed off the stack and checks if there is an enclosing container layer. Every valid SVG file is guaranteed to have at least one container layer (at a minimum, a SVGRootElement instance).

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/c:@M@SwiftS.name: parserDidEndDocument(_:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/c:@M@SwiftS.abstract: The XMLParserDelegate method called when the parser has finished parsing the SVG document. All supported elements and attributes are guaranteed to be dispatched at this point, but there’s no guarantee that all elements have finished parsing.

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/c:@M@SwiftS.name: parser(_:parseErrorOccurred:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/c:@M@SwiftS.abstract: The XMLParserDelegate method called when the parser has reached a fatal error in parsing. Parsing is stopped if an error is reached and you may want to check that your SVG file passes validation.

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: resizeContainerBoundingBox(_:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: Method that resizes the container bounding box that fits all the subpaths.

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.name: finishedProcessing(_:)
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html#/s:8SwiftSVG.abstract: The CanManageAsychronousParsing callback called when an ParsesAsynchronously element has finished parsing

Classes/SVGRectangle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG12.name: xCornerRadius

Classes/SVGRectangle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG12.name: yCornerRadius
Classes/SVGRectangle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG12.abstract: The y radius of the corner oval. Defaults to 0

Classes/SVGRectangle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG12.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this rectangle’s origin y

Classes/SVGRectangle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG12.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this rectangle’s width

Classes/SVGRectangle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG12.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this rectangle’s x corner radius

Classes/SVGRectangle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG12.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this rectangle’s y corner radius

Classes/SVGRectangle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG12.abstract: Creates a new rectangle path based on the set attributes.

Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGPat.abstract: Attributes that are applied after the path has been processed

Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGPat.name: shouldParseAsynchronously
Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGPat.abstract: Flag that sets whether the path should be parsed asynchronously or not

Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGPat.name: init(singlePathString:)
Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGPat.abstract: Initializer to to set the svgLayer‘s cgPath. The path string does not have to be a single path for the whole element, but can include multiple subpaths in the d attribute. For instance, the following is a valid path string to pass:

Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGPat.name: parseD(_:)
Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGPat.abstract: Function that takes a d path string attribute and sets the svgLayer‘s cgPath

Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGPat.name: clipRule(_:)
Classes/SVGPath.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGPat.abstract: The clip rule for this path to be applied after the path has been parsed

Classes/SVGLine.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGLin.name: x1(x1:)
Classes/SVGLine.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGLin.abstract: Function parses a number string and sets this line’s start x

Classes/SVGLine.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGLin.abstract: Function parses a number string and sets this line’s end x

Classes/SVGLine.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGLin.name: y1(y1:)
Classes/SVGLine.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGLin.abstract: Function parses a number string and sets this line’s start y

Classes/SVGLine.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGLin.name: y2(y2:)
Classes/SVGLine.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGLin.abstract: Function parses a number string and sets this line’s end y

Classes/SVGLine.html#/s:8SwiftSVG7SVGLin.abstract: Draws a line from the startPoint to the endPoint

Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGGr.name: delayedAttributes
Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGGr.abstract: Store all attributes and values to be applied after all known sublayers have been added to this container

Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGGr.name: containerLayer
Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGGr.abstract: A CALayer that will hold all sublayers of the SVGGroup

Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGGr.name: didProcessElement(in:)
Classes/SVGGroup.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGGr.abstract: The function that is called after all of this group’s subelements have been processed. It will apply all stored delayedAttributes on all sublayers

Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.name: xRadius(r:)
Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s x radius

Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.name: yRadius(r:)
Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s y radius

Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.name: xCenter(x:)
Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s x center

Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.name: yCenter(y:)
Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s y center

Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.name: didProcessElement(in:)
Classes/SVGEllipse.html#/s:8SwiftSVG10SV.abstract: Function that is called after the ellipse’s center and radius have been parsed and set. This function creates the path and sets the internal SVGLayer‘s path.

Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SVGC.name: radius(r:)
Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SVGC.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s radius

Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SVGC.name: xCenter(x:)
Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SVGC.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s x center

Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SVGC.name: yCenter(y:)
Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SVGC.abstract: Function that parses the number string and sets this instance’s y center

Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SVGC.name: didProcessElement(in:)
Classes/SVGCircle.html#/s:8SwiftSVG9SVGC.abstract: Function that is called after the circle’s center and radius have been parsed and set. This function creates the path and sets the internal SVGLayer‘s path.

Classes/SVGCache.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGCa.name: default
Classes/SVGCache.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGCa.abstract: A singleton object that is the default store for SVGlayers

Classes/SVGCache.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGCa.abstract: Subscript to get or set the SVGLayer in this cache

Classes/SVGView.html#/c:@M@SwiftSVG@objc.name: SVGName
Classes/SVGView.html#/c:@M@SwiftSVG@objc.abstract: The name of the SVG file in the main bundle

Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGLa.name: boundingBox
Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGLa.abstract: The minimum CGRect that fits all subpaths

Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGLa.name: svgLayerCopy
Classes/SVGLayer.html#/s:8SwiftSVG8SVGLa.abstract: Returns a copy of the given SVGLayer

Classes/SVGLayer.html#/c:@CM@SwiftSVG@ob.name: fillColor
Classes/SVGLayer.html#/c:@CM@SwiftSVG@ob.abstract: Applies the given fill color to all sublayers

Classes/SVGLayer.html#/c:@CM@SwiftSVG@ob.name: lineWidth
Classes/SVGLayer.html#/c:@CM@SwiftSVG@ob.abstract: Applies the given line width to all CAShapeLayers

Classes/SVGLayer.html#/c:@CM@SwiftSVG@ob.name: strokeColor
Classes/SVGLayer.html#/c:@CM@SwiftSVG@ob.abstract: Applies the given stroke color to all CAShapeLayers

Classes/SVGLayer.html.name: SVGLayer
Classes/SVGLayer.html.abstract: A CAShapeLayer subclass that allows you to easily work with sublayers and get sizing information

Classes/SVGView.html.name: SVGView
Classes/SVGView.html.abstract: A UIView subclass that can be used in Interface Builder where you can set the @IBInspectable propert SVGName in the side panel. Use the UIView extensions if you want to creates SVG views programmatically.

Classes/SVGCache.html.name: SVGCache
Classes/SVGCache.html.abstract: A minimal in-memory cache class for caching SVGLayers. The default singleton is the default cache used and you can optionally create your own static singleton through an extension.

Classes/SVGCircle.html.name: SVGCircle
Classes/SVGCircle.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <circle> element and its attributes

Classes/SVGEllipse.html.name: SVGEllipse
Classes/SVGEllipse.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <ellipse> element and its attributes

Classes/SVGGroup.html.name: SVGGroup
Classes/SVGGroup.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a container from a <g> element and applies its attribites to all sublayers

Classes/SVGLine.html.name: SVGLine
Classes/SVGLine.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <line> element and its attributes

Classes/SVGPath.html.name: SVGPath
Classes/SVGPath.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <path> element and its attributes

Classes/SVGRectangle.html.name: SVGRectangle
Classes/SVGRectangle.html.abstract: Concrete implementation that creates a CAShapeLayer from a <rect> element and its attributes

Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html.name: NSXMLSVGParser
Classes/NSXMLSVGParser.html.abstract: Concrete implementation of SVGParser that uses Foundation’s XMLParser to parse a given SVG file.
